body:
modified the recipe for the issue reported #24497 , and cleaned up the hip-rocclr recipe.
for hip-rocclr, i just built hip-rocclr@4.2.0 , hip-rocclr-4.1.0 and hip-rocclr-3.5.0 .
After from that i built the hipcub@4.2.0. i did not see any failures etc.
title: update hip-rocclr recipe and fix dangling pointer in rocm-smi-lib
